Class JSONUtility

java.lang.Object
cop3330.util.JSONUtility
public class JSONUtility extends Object
A utility class that provides functionality to export a list of Student objects (and their enrolled Course data) to a JSON-formatted file.

This class manually generates JSON output for students, including their identifying information, status (undergraduate or graduate), tuition, credit hours, and enrolled courses.

  • Method Details

    • exportJSON

      public static void exportJSON(GenericList<Student> students, String fileName) throws FileNotFoundException
      Exports the given list of students into a JSON-formatted file.

      This method inspects each Student object (and its subtype: GraduateStudent or UndergraduateStudent) and serializes relevant fields into JSON format.

      Parameters:
      students - the list of students to export
      fileName - the name of the file to write the JSON output to
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file cannot be created or opened for writing
